review.reviewBody: gnocchi was delicious but could use a wee bit more sauce. Mama’s Mushroom Soup Zuppa was also very delicious but was thinner than before. I loved the bread that came with the Mama’s Mushroom Soup Zuppa Chef's Kiss!

needed more customization options, the food is fine in its own (the top of our calzones had soaked through which wasn't great but it was dealable) but the fact I couldnt add something to spice it up, or take away the borderline rancid ricotta was a real deal breaker. would not reccomend either calzone. The Spicy Meatball Bambino Calzone. The Italian Medio Calzone. 
mediocre at best and inedible at worst.

I was disappointed with the meal overall. I received a very small portion of the Crispy Fried Ravioli. only 5 pieces, for $18.00 this certainly did not provide the value for the amount of food that was delivered. The Salsiccia 10in.  was tasty although again a little pricey for such a small portion. The Cannoli. was quite heavily fried and the raw chocolate chips was a big detractor for me and is not representative of a traditional Cannoli. Flavor wise it was a fine meal, although the amount of food received for nearly $75.00 for the total of the order was definitely a hard stop for me to order from this location again.
They had to scan my ID before they gave me the tiramisu. Most ridiculous thing ive ever done. Heaven forbid someone underage might indulge in some cake.
Pacifico has amazing pizza and amazing service. It's my go to every time I'm ordering Italian.
